Definition of bets on French roulette.
PROOF  A full number: 35  x bet
CAVAL  Two neighboring numbers: 17  x bet
TRASVERSALE FULL  Three numbers on the same horizontal line: 11  x bet
CARRÉ  Four united numbers: 8  x bet
PRIME FIRST FIRST FIRST  The first four numbers (0,1,2,3): 8  x bet
TRASVERSAL SIMPLE Horizontal block of six numbers: 5  x bet
COLONNA A column of twelve numbers: 2  x bet
DOZZINE (1-12) - (13-24) - (25-36): 2  x bet
MANQUE  (1-18): 1  x bet
PASSES  (19-36): 1  x bet
RED OR BLACK OR BLACK 1  x bet
PARES OR DISPARTS 1  x bet

Roulette information.
In the European roulette, the wheel contains 37 numbered boxes from zero to 36. This means that players have better chances than other roulette tables, such as the American one, which has more boxes.
The two main sections of the table on which the stakes are placed are the internal and external parts. Each one offers different betting modes.
The inner part offers bets on single numbers or groups of numbers that are close to each other on the table layout for up to six numbers with a single episode.
The exterior offers the possibility to focus on pairs of options such as: red or black, high or low or even and odd or odd (each of which covers 18 numbers). You can also make six different episodes of 12 numbers (divided into two types, three columns and three dozens).
In addition, betting groups of 7 to 17 numbers are available, placed on different wheel segments. These bets can be placed by clicking on the outer oval (' racetrack'), the part of the table that reproduces exactly the order in which the numbers are shown on the wheel, unlike the numerical order in which the numbers are placed in the main layout for bets.

PROOF  A full number
CAVAL  Two neighboring numbers
TRASVERSALE FULL  Three numbers on the same horizontal line
CARRÉ  Four united numbers
PRIME FIRST FIRST FIRST  The first four numbers (0,1,2,3)
TRASVERSAL SIMPLE Horizontal block 
COLONNA A column of twelve number
RED OR BLACK OR BLACK 
PARES OR DISPARTS 

Roulette information. (Roulette table)
In the European roulette, the wheel contains 37 numbered boxes from zero to 36. This means that players have better chances than other roulette tables, such as the American one, which has more boxes.

title: Roulette Offline Online
description:
In the game, players may choose to place bets on either a single number or a range of numbers, the colors red or black, or whether the number is odd or even, or if the numbers are high (19–36) or low (1–18).

To determine the winning number and color, a croupier spins a wheel in one direction, then spins a ball in the opposite direction around a tilted circular track running around the circumference of the wheel. The ball eventually loses momentum and falls onto the wheel and into one of 37 (in French/European roulette) or 38 (in American roulette) colored and numbered pockets on the wheel.

Roulette players have a variety of betting options. Placing inside bets is either selecting the exact number of the pocket the ball will land in, or a small range of pockets based on their proximity on the layout. Players wishing to bet on the 'outside' will select bets on larger positional groupings of pockets, the pocket color, or whether the winning number is odd or even.[5] The payout odds for each type of bet are based on its probability.

The roulette table usually imposes minimum and maximum bets, and these rules usually apply separately for all of a player's inside and outside bets for each spin. For inside bets at roulette tables, some casinos may use separate roulette table chips of various colors to distinguish players at the table. Players can continue to place bets as the ball spins around the wheel until the dealer announces no more bets or rien ne va plus.

Croupier's rake pushing chips across a roulette layout
When a winning number and color is determined by the roulette wheel, the dealer will place a marker, also known as a dolly, on that winning number on the roulette table layout. When the dolly is on the table, no players may place bets, collect bets, or remove any bets from the table. The dealer will then sweep away all other losing bets either by hand or rake, and determine all of the payouts to the remaining inside and outside winning bets. When the dealer is finished making payouts, the marker is removed from the board where players collect their winnings and make new bets. The winning chips remain on the board.
summary: Roulette is a casino game named after the French word meaning little wheel.

No ads.

title: Roulette
description:
The game has been played in its present form since as early as 1796 in Paris, Roulette is a casino game named after the French word meaning little wheel. In the game, players may choose to place bets on either a single number, various groupings of numbers, the colors red or black, whether the number is odd or even, or if the numbers are high (19–36) or low (1–18).

To determine the winning number and color, a croupier spins a wheel in one direction, then spins a ball in the opposite direction around a tilted circular track running around the circumference of the wheel. The ball eventually loses momentum, passes through an area of deflectors, and falls onto the wheel and into one of 37 (in French/European style roulette) or 38 (in American style roulette) colored and numbered pockets on the wheel.

With our Roulette application you can play roulette from any device, you can bet with your friends to see who is the best, you can play with it at a party and be the center of the fun and above all become the king of roulette.

title: Scratch Lotto Mania
description:
You are welcome to play free scratch-off lottery game. It is actually the most addicting time killer with lots of glossy scratch cards and sharp mechanics.

Scratch Lotto Mania offers:

- The variety of themes - from famous Slots, Casino and Dices to fun cartoonish settings as Sunny Farm and Klondike’s Gold Rush.
- Colorful and fun scratch tickets with different mechanics.
- Super easy and fun scratch mechanics without any glitches
- No distractions - no pop up ads

We are constantly adding new tickets with new fascinating winning algorithms to test you luck and let you win BIG.

Scratch Lotto Mania game mechanics:

The levels are represented by unique scratch-off cards. Each card has it’s own rules and betting amount. You can access the rules right from the game screen by pressing little “i” button on the card.

Betting amount is deducted from your Balance as a cost of the scratched card. You can add more coins by pressing “+” button and get coins by watching the video ad or purchase a coins package via in-app purchase system.

You can scratch the ticket manually or use the InstantScratch button to avoid bothering yourself with unnecessary movements and immediately see the playing numbers (or symbols).

Playing more cards will raise your experience and will lead to the level progress.

Before playing new level take a chance in betting on the Bonus Reel to win more coins.

Please note that this game is for entertainment purpose and you could not win real money from this game.
summary: Free scratch-off lottery game with glossy scratch cards and sharp mechanics

description:
The Official National Lottery app is where you can play: 

Lotto
•	The one. The only. The original National Lottery game.
•	It’s the nation’s game, with thousands winning prizes in every draw.
•	Lotto tickets cost £2 per play, with draws every Wednesday and Saturday.

EuroMillions

•	EuroMillions tickets cost £2.50 per play, with draws every Tuesday and Friday.

Set For Life
•	Dig out your bucket list! You could win £10,000 every month for 30 years* with Set For Life.
•	Pay just £1.50 per line and play up to 4 weeks in advance.
•	Draw days every Monday and Thursday.

Thunderball 
•	£1 might make your night. Win £500,000* for just £1!
•	Draws every Tuesday, Wednesday, Friday and Saturday.

Or play an Instant Win Game
•	In just a few taps, you could win anything from a few pounds to a life-changing million.

•	Games cost from £1 to £5 to play.

Lotto HotPicks & EuroMillions HotPicks
•	Bigger prizes for fewer numbers
•	Pick and match winning balls from the main draws or choose a Lucky Dip® for randomly selected numbers. 

And don't forget, every time you play a National Lottery game you help support Good Causes all over the UK. In fact, £30M is raised on average each week**.

Besides playing, managing how you do so has never been easier:

•	Enable Fingerprint Recognition and sign-in to your account instantly.
•	Save your lucky numbers and enter draws at the tap of a button.
•	In a rush? Scan your paper tickets in seconds to see if you’re a winner.
•	Link your bank account details to add and withdraw funds at any time.
•	Set limits to manage fund levels and how many games you can play per day.

Download now and play The National Lottery from the palm of your hand.

To improve the app experience, we collect anonymous information about browsing behaviour. More information is available in our Privacy Policy at https://www.national-lottery.co.uk/privacy-policy
 
If you have a suggestion, a bug to report or a new feature for us to consider, we want to know! Email app@camelotgroup.co.uk.

title: BetConnect - Sports Betting
description:
Betconnect is the world’s only social betting network that gives you access to the bets of professional gamblers. We send you personalised bets - each called a Bet Request - direct from the Pros for you to Match. 
You decide what to do next. Do you Follow or Lay? Whatever sport you bet on, we’ve got Pro’s who want to bet on it – from football to rugby, from golf to horseracing, we’ve got you covered.

What is betconnect?

Real Pro Gamblers

Our Pros are real professional gamblers who are restricted or closed by the bookies due to their success. Why else would they pay us a commission to get their bets placed and share their tips?

In It Together

Our Pros are putting their money where their mouth is – every Bet Request is the ultimate tip. Each one is being backed by one of our Pros. You can trust that they want winners just as much as you.

Crowd Betting

Every Bet Request you receive is just the “tip” of the iceberg - our pros are using staking much much more.   Our technology intelligently splits the stake and distributes, via the betconnect network, to Punters like you, so you can share in their success.   

Time Is Money

Every Bet Request is so good you need to act fast to maximise value. Time is of the essence as you only have 15 minutes to Match and make your next decision…

The Benefits Are All Yours!

When you Follow a Bet Request by placing it with other bookmakers you get to take advantage of their Free Bet, Money Back Special and Best Odds Guaranteed promotions. If you lay a Bet Request on betconnect and you beat the Pro you pay zero commission on your profits.

How Does It Work?

Step 1:   Connect

We Connect you to a network of professional gamblers. Restricted and often closed by the bookies due to their success, they have bets they want to place. That’s where you come in! You’ll be notified when the betconnect algorithm allocates you a Bet Request that meets your betting preferences.  Whether you like football, rugby, horse racing, golf, tennis or something a little more niche, the pros on betconnect are betting on it!

Don't want to wait?  Press the betconnect button to be next in the queue.

Step 2:  Match

Unlock the Bet Request to reveal details of the bet and get the ultimate tip! You now have 15 minutes to Match it on betconnect, safe in the knowledge that the same odds or better are available with the bookmakers… meanwhile you move on nicely to step 3.

Step 3:  Follow

Here's where it gets interesting....

Just how good is this pro?

title: Sports Bet Calculator
description:

* Trixie, Yankee, Canadian & Heinz.

* Patent, Yap, Lucky 15, Lucky 31 & Lucky 63.

* Round Robin, Flag, Super Flag & Heinz Flag.
* Super Heinz Flag & Goliath Flag.
* Fivespot, Pontoon & Magnificent 7.

* Alphabet & Union Jack (all variants)

More Highlights:-

* Perms available on most bet types (except certain Speciality bets).
* Flexible input of stake & odds.
* Calculate unit stake from a total stake limit.
* Calculate understaked and overstaked bets, with 'Exact Total' stake setting.

* Place Terms from 1/1 (all up to win) to 1/6.
* Rule 4 deductions.
* Dead Heat for win or place.

* Apply bonus to Return or Winnings.
* Light and Dark color schemes.
* Inbuilt help for all bet types & options.

Your latest bet details can be retained, and modified for use in more calculations, even if the app is shutdown and restarted.

title: BetMines Free Football Betting Tips & Predictions
description:
Over 400,000 users rely on BetMines. Follow our daily betting tips for football, analyse team statistics, follow other tipsters bets, test your strategy by creating free virtual football bets, follow livescore and much more!

BetMines is a totally free football betting support application that offers several tools to help you increase your success rate and teach you how to bet!

---- DAILY TIPS ----

We are the best football predictions and football tips app. We provide FREE and accurate daily football betting predictions and tips for each match elaborated by an artificial intelligence algorithm constantly evolving.
The algorithm takes into account the history of the results of the teams, the state of recent form, head-2-head matches, home and away performances, statistical data of the reference league, any sidelined player, the fluctuation of odds (provided by an important bookmaker) and on the basis of these and other data elaborates the most likely outcome of each match.

In addition to the football tips of the algorithm, we also provide two bets of the day elaborated by our team of football betting experts: Doubling and Risk of the Day.
All the bet predictions are free!

---- SOCIAL FOOTBALL BETTING ------

Football betting becomes social!
You can follow the best tipsters in the application, copy their bets and become yourself a reference point for the community .

When you sign up you will receive 1000 virtual diamonds with which you can create virtual bets , both to test your gaming strategies and to challenge other tipsters and climb the rankings of the best tipsters of the day, week, month and ever.

The ranking is based on the profit generated by the tipster in the concerned period , so you can easily identify the best BetMines's tipster!
The best daily bets will be published on our social channels.
NB: You don't win any cash prizes, these are virtual bets ( and not real money ) with the aim of testing your gaming strategies and having fun at the same time!

It is a tool that allows you to generate bets with a high probability of success taking into account the selected criteria.
You choose the leagues you want to bet on, the type of event (1X2, double chance, under/over , combo and both team to score), the desired odds range, the number of matches and BetMines will generate for you the most likely bet based on the criteria you have chosen.

- possibility to choose your favorite leagues

title: Spread Betting - Global Forex Trading Platform
description:
Spread Betting: A Global Forex Trading Platform

Download to trade with competitive spreads on hundreds of CFDs and Forex trading markets.

Take advantage of online trading opportunities:

•	Trade a variety of financial markets around the world, around the clock.
•	Enjoy a maximum-security trading platform
•	Never miss a trading opportunity!

Start in 3 easy steps:
Download the app, create an account and start trading! Easy…

Our #1 Spread Betting App offers:

•	Bond trading
•	Bitcoin and cryptocurrency trading
•	Futures and options
•	Trade on Metal prices such as gold, silver, copper +
•	Trade on commodity prices such as oil, gas, wheat +
•	Trade international indices: UK100, Nasdaq, Germany 30 and Australia 200 
•	Well over 1000 international stocks from companies in the UK, U.S, Europe, Asia and Australia
•	Multiple trading markets such as CFD Trading, cryptocurrency trading, forex trading, and trade spread betting.

New to Spread Betting? Here is what you should know

Spread betting deals with legal staking, where profits and losses are calculated according to the level at which the value of a particular asset changes from the spread quoted by the trading platform. In spread trading, participants do not actually own the underlying asset they trade on, such as a stock or commodity.

The “spread” is a term used to refer to two prices— the bid price and the offer price. These two prices are always woven around the basic market price.

The spread broker advertises their bid and offer prices.  You, as the trader, can choose to invest on either price.  The outcome is decided according to the initial price being higher/lower than what you chose to invest on.

Spread betting allows you to trade on the price movements or variations on a great number of financial markets, with indices, shares, stock, commodities, and currencies.

Try the app today and get:

	An award-winning platform and modern technology 
	Swift, easy payments and highly secure withdrawals
	Exceptional trade execution, risk management and honest pricing
	Over twenty years of experience in spread betting, CFD, and forex trades

	Reviewing trade and order history

Download now and start trading today!

# Trading view

# 6 tips to become a successful trader
# 4 important things to remember when trading on Forex
# Info

Breakout trading strategies are one of the most popular Forex strategies used by traders. They are primarily used to capture moves in the early stages of a trend when a currency pair is seen to move beyond a predefined level in the market.

This level can be a previous level of support /resistance or a move out of an acknowledge market range that has defined previous trading boundaries. 

The completion of chart patterns, highs and lows in the market or even the preceding trading session can all provide situations for breakouts to occur. The central concept behind a breakout is to capture the market momentum that accompanies the break.

Hope these apps can help you to get better understanding in Forex Trading Beginner's Guide, then improve your performance in trading.

Stay tune for next update!

- Long volumes and Short volumes
- Long positions and Short positions
- Net Volumes: The ratio between Long volumes and short volumes
- Net Positions: The ratio between Long positions and short positions
- Percentage: The percent of long volumes and short volumes
When you decide to invest in forex market so you will have a lot of questions time by time: How is current trend of market? it's grow up, it's down or side way? Whether the trend is about to reverse or continue? The current strength of market is strong or weak...etc...It's not easy to answer. There are too many indicators trying to answer that questions but they are not really effective because the indicators only focus on price rather than psychological analysis of buyers and sellers. 
The fact is that the market sometime against the majority traders so when you decide trade the forex market, you need a valuables data to know what the majority of traders are doing and decide to trade or exit trade.
You can using Forex Sentiment to invest in Forex, Stock, Coin, Asset management or personal financial. Happy trading!

title: Guide For Learn Forex Trading - Learn to Trade
description:
Guide For Learn Forex Trading - Learn to Trade. Complete Master Guide For Learn Forex Trading - Learn to Trade 2020 - No Ads

Learn everything you need to know to start Trading on the Forex Market today!

In this course I will show you how you can take advantage of currency movements to make profits. We will talk in detail about Currencies, Charts, Bulls & Bears, Short Selling, 

learn how to read the Calendar of Economic events, which is imperative for Fundamental trading on Forex as well as other Financial marketplaces such as NYSE, London Stock Exchange, Futures Exchanges, and more.

I will thoroughly explain how Forex Brokers work, so that you are able to easily separate Honest Brokers from the unreliable ones when you are ready to open a Real Trading account. I even include a FREE guide to selecting a Forex broker, based on my own experience of Real trading.



I will also supply you with a Forex Market Hours wallpaper for YOUR timezone, allowing you to effortlessly monitor the activity of Global Forex Market participants throughout the day.


This course is for complete beginners! All you need is an open mind and a passion to be successful! 

What is Forex? 

Forex, also known as foreign exchange,  FX, or currency trading, is a decentralized global market where all the world's currencies trade. The Forex market is the largest, most liquid market in the world with an average daily trading volume exceeding $5 trillion. All the world's combined stock markets don't even come close to this. But what does that mean to you? Take a closer look at Forex trading and you may find some exciting trading opportunities unavailable with other investments.

Why Learn Forex Trading: Advantages Of Forex Trading

There are many benefits and advantages of Forex Trading for Beginners. Here are just a few reasons why so many people are choosing Forex Trading:

No commissions Forex Trading

No clearing fees, no exchange fees, no government fees, no brokerage fees. Most retail brokers are compensated for their services through something called the “bid/ask spread“.

No middlemen in Forex Trading

Spot currency trading eliminates the middlemen and allows you to trade directly with the market responsible for the pricing on a particular currency pair.

No fixed lot size in Forex Trading

In spot Forex, you determine your own lot or position size. This allows traders to participate with accounts as small as $25.


Forex Trading is a 24-hour market

There is no waiting for the opening bell. From the Monday morning opening in Australia to the afternoon close in New York, the forex market never sleeps. This is awesome for those who want to trade on a part-time basis because you can choose when you want to trade: morning, noon, night, during breakfast, or in your sleep.

No one can corner the market in Forex Trading

The foreign exchange market is so huge and has so many participants that no single entity can control the market price for an extended period of time.

Low Barriers to Entry

You would think that getting started as a currency trader would cost a ton of money. The fact is, when compared to trading stocks, options, or futures, it doesn’t. Online forex brokers offer “mini” and “micro” trading accounts, some with a minimum account deposit of $25.

Topics Included in this App

1- Introduction to Forex Trading to Beginner
2- The Structure of the Forex Market
3- Major Currencies & Trade System
4- Market Analysis in Forex Trading
5- Type of Foreign Exchange Market
6- Benefits of Forex Trading
7- Fundamental Market Forces
8- Technical Indicators in Forex Trading
9- Pattern Study of Trends
10- Technical Strategy in Price Patterns
11- Oscillator Divergences
12- The Role of Inflation in Forex Trading
13- The Commodity Connection
14- Position of Money Management
15- Foreign Exchange Risks
16- Trading Rules
summary: Complete Master Guide For Learn Forex Trading - Learn to Trade 2020 - No Ads

title: Forex Trading Game & Stock Market Simulator
description:
The ultimate app if you want to learn forex trading.

📚 Save loads of time as we have distilled dozens of forex & investing books into bite-sized bits of valuable tips & tricks.

If you think your average economics teacher would be a successful trader in the financial markets, think again.
 
According to Stanford University researchers Barberis and Huang, he most probably wouldn’t.
 
Even the smartest finance bookworms make mistakes when using traditional theory models.
 
We dislike fluff and non-working theory so we developed the Forex Hero app that is quite different from all other trading education materials out there.
 
We value the time of our users and we hate boring and ineffective stuff. So we have gone through dozens of forex books, articles, and currency trading webinars, so you don’t have to spend a minute on things that are not effective.
 
Forex Hero contains the distilled tools, pro tips, and insider strategies you won’t find anywhere else.

Here are some of the awesome features of Forex Hero:
 

📗 ILLUSTRATED TRADING SCHOOL
🔥 Uncover the one rule that many businessmen fail to capitalize on.

• Learn the principles & secrets of forex trading.
• Beautifully illustrated & easy to read.
• Suited also for forex beginners & dummies.

🕑 BEST FOREX MARKET HOURS
🔥 Unlock the best and the worst times for trading so you can get the biggest bang for your buck!

• See forex market trading hours at a glance for London, New York, Sydney & Tokyo.
• Check at what time does the forex market open and close in the major trading sessions.
• Unlike other tools - you don’t have to worry about calculating your time zone relative to EST etc.
• Also, you don’t have to worry about daylight saving times - it’s all built in.

 📈 FOREX & STOCK MARKET SIMULATOR
🔥 See how Pro traders predict forex and stock market movements by scanning the news headlines.

• Learn the fundamental strategies with this epic trading simulator game.
• More than 100 real-world situations with actionable analysis.


✅ INTERACTIVE QUIZ
🔥Test your skills with this fun trivia game!

• Deepen your knowledge with the explanations.
• Earn game money with every correct answer.

What makes this application different is its relentless focus on actionable details - especially in the interactive case studies of the Trend Predictor, which is the favorite section of our users.
 
Most forex and stock trading learning materials simply present dry theoretical facts like “currency prices are influenced by interest rates, consumer confidence, the current account on balance of payments and economic growth.” Does this information seem valuable and actionable to you? Or would you rather learn specific correlations that have been used and proven by traders? A few examples:
 
▶ When the price of gold rises, so does AUD against USD.
▶ If the oil prices go down, so does CAD against JPY.
▶ If the weather forecast predicts high temperatures in Russia, then the wheat price goes up.
